workflow.name: AODR - Process Remote AO Cluster Workflows for Import
workflow.title: AODR - Process Remote AO Cluster Workflows for Import

properties.name: ls_DR Enabled Category name
properties.description: Provide the Category label used on the Primary AO Cluster which denotes workflows that need to be synchronized with the secondary
This workflow reads workflows from a remote AO Cluster and processes them for local import.  Any triggers (schedules) are disabled, but are noted for later restoration, if needed.
properties.display_name: AODR - Process Remote AO Cluster Workflows for Import

$activity.definition_activity_01G6FCI6584590XQoXIcioDjqxPqYMiGXa2.output.variable_workflow_01G6DR7OTEXVY6Q6gCqMgxLrTXbPUHneV4w$

properties.body:
Secondary Action Orchestrator system has synchronized workflows with the primary.

To preserve secure string integrity some workflow variables and runtime users need to be manually updated, one-time on the secondary AO system.
Further DR synchronization will re-use the existing variables and run-time users, therefore additional maintenance should not be required.

$workflow.definition_workflow_01G4M9LQS478M7KDwglXfy1UN8sF3Sx6yTl.local.variable_workflow_01G6FGEAXDJZ83lXu9d23ckZFhRqK3mYDIn$
